Synopsis: Converts the size of Exchange data to a specified unit of measurement.
Description: This function takes the size of Exchange data and converts it to the specified unit of measurement (Bytes, KB, MB, GB, TB).

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Convert-ExchangeSize -To MB -Size '49 GB (52,613,349,376 bytes)'
# Returns the size converted to MB.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
Convert-ExchangeSize -To GB -Size '49 GB (52,613,349,376 bytes)' -Precision 2 -Display
# Returns the size converted to GB with 2 decimal places and displays the result.
